trans-unit.source: Adds a buffering layer to read and write operations on another stream.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et bufring lag for å lese og skrive operasjoner i en annen dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.BufferedStream"></xref> class with a default buffer size of 4096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.BufferedStream"> </xref> klassen med en standard bufferstørrelse på 4096 byte.

trans-unit.source: A shared read/write buffer is allocated the first time a `BufferedStream` object is initialized with this constructor.
trans-unit.target: En delt skrivetilgang buffer er tildelt første gang en `BufferedStream` -objektet er initialisert med denne konstruktøren.

trans-unit.source: The shared buffer is not used if all reads and writes are greater than or equal to `bufferSize`.
trans-unit.target: Den delte bufferen brukes ikke hvis alle lesing og skriving tillates som er større enn eller lik `bufferSize`.

trans-unit.source: The current stream.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: stream is .
trans-unit.target: streamis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.BufferedStream"></xref> class with the specified buffer size.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.BufferedStream"> </xref> klassen med den angitte bufferstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: A shared read/write buffer is allocated the first time a `BufferedStream` object is initialized with this constructor.
trans-unit.target: En delt skrivetilgang buffer er tildelt første gang en `BufferedStream` -objektet er initialisert med denne konstruktøren.

trans-unit.source: The shared buffer is not used if all reads and writes are greater than or equal to `bufferSize`.
trans-unit.target: Den delte bufferen brukes ikke hvis alle lesing og skriving tillates som er større enn eller lik `bufferSize`.

trans-unit.source: The current stream.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The buffer size in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Bufferstørrelsen i byte.

trans-unit.source: stream is .
trans-unit.target: streamis .

trans-unit.source: bufferSize is negative.
trans-unit.target: bufferSizeer negativt.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon.

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync*> instead; see the Remarks section.)
trans-unit.target: (Vurder å bruke <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync*>i stedet; se under Merknader.)</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync*>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> to implement asynchronous file operations.
trans-unit.target: I .NET Framework 4 og tidligere versjoner, må du bruke metoder som <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>og <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>implementere asynkrone filoperasjoner.</xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous file operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene er fortsatt tilgjengelige i det [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] å støtte eldre kode; imidlertid metodene for ny asynkron eksempel <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A>, og <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A>, hjelp du implementere asynkrone filoperasjoner enklere.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A> must be called exactly once for every call to BeginRead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A>må kalles nøyaktig én gang for hvert kall til BeginRead.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: Failing to end a read process before beginning another read can cause undesirable behavior such as deadlock.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke avslutte en lesefeil prosess før du starter en ny leseoperasjon, kan det føre til uønsket virkemåte for eksempel vranglås.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use the <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bruk av <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.CanRead%2A>til å fastslå om den gjeldende forekomsten, støtter lesing.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.CanRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndRead%2A> must be called with this <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to find out how many bytes were read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndRead%2A>må kalles med dette <xref:System.IAsyncResult>å finne ut hvor mange byte ble lest.</xref:System.IAsyncResult></xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to read the data into.
trans-unit.target: Buffer til å lese inn dataene.

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in `buffer` at which to begin writing data read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen i byte i `buffer` som til å skrive data til å lese fra dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som skal leses.

trans-unit.source: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read is complete.
trans-unit.target: En valgfri asynkrone Tilbakekall kalles når lesingen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: Et gitt objekt som skiller bestemt asynkrone skrivebeskyttede forespørselen fra andre forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the asynchronous read, which could still be pending.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer asynkron lesing, som fortsatt kan venter.

trans-unit.source: buffer is .
trans-unit.target: bufferis .

trans-unit.source: offset or count is negative.
trans-unit.target: offseteller count er negativt.

trans-unit.source: Attempted an asynchronous read past the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på en asynkron lesing forbi slutten på dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The buffer length minus offset is less than count.
trans-unit.target: Bufferlengden minus offset er mindre enn count .

trans-unit.source: The current stream does not support the read operation.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende Dataflyten støtter ikke leseoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron skriveoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync*> instead; see the Remarks section.)
trans-unit.target: (Vurder å bruke <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync*>i stedet; se under Merknader.)</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A> to implement asynchronous file operations.
trans-unit.target: I .NET Framework 4 og tidligere versjoner, må du bruke metoder som <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>og <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A>implementere asynkrone filoperasjoner.</xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous file operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene er fortsatt tilgjengelige i det [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] å støtte eldre kode; imidlertid metodene for ny asynkron eksempel <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A>, og <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A>, hjelp du implementere asynkrone filoperasjoner enklere.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A> must be called exactly once on every <xref:System.IAsyncResult> from BeginWrite.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A>må kalles nøyaktig én gang for hver <xref:System.IAsyncResult>fra BeginWrite.</xref:System.IAsyncResult></xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A> will block until the I/O operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A>blokkerer før i/u-operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The buffer containing data to write to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen som inneholder data å skrive til gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in `buffer` at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning nullbasert byte i `buffer` som du vil kopiere byte til gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som skal skrive.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the asynchronous write operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som skal kalles når asynkrone Skriveoperasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: Et gitt objekt som skiller denne bestemt asynkrone skriveforespørselen fra andre forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: An object that references the asynchronous write which could still be pending.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som refererer til asynkron skriving som kan fortsatt som venter.

trans-unit.source: buffer length minus offset is less than count.
trans-unit.target: bufferlengden minus offset er mindre enn count.

trans-unit.source: buffer is .
trans-unit.target: bufferis .

trans-unit.source: offset or count is negative.
trans-unit.target: offseteller count er negativt.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke skriving.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den gjeldende Dataflyten støtter lesing.

trans-unit.source: If a class derived from <xref:System.IO.Stream> does not support reading, calls to the <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadByte%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>, and the `Peek` methods of <xref:System.IO.StreamReader>, <xref:System.IO.StringReader>, and <xref:System.IO.TextReader> throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.Stream>støtter ikke lesing, kall til den <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadByte%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>, og `Peek` metoder for <xref:System.IO.StreamReader>, <xref:System.IO.StringReader>, og <xref:System.IO.TextReader>Iverksett <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.IO.TextReader> </xref:System.IO.StringReader> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader> </xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadByte%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Read%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If the stream is closed, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dataflyten er lukket, denne egenskapen returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the stream supports reading; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the stream is closed or was opened with write-only access.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Dataflyten støtter lesing; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis dataflyten er lukket eller ble åpnet med lesebeskyttet tilgang.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den gjeldende Dataflyten støtter søking.

trans-unit.source: If a class derived from <xref:System.IO.Stream> does not support seeking, calls to <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Length%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.SetLength%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Position%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A> throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.Stream>støtter ikke søking, kaller til <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Length%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.SetLength%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Position%2A>, og <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A>Iverksett <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Position%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.SetLength%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Length%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If the stream is closed, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dataflyten er lukket, denne egenskapen returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the stream supports seeking; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the stream is closed or if the stream was constructed from an operating system handle such as a pipe or output to the console.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Dataflyten støtter søking; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis dataflyten er lukket eller dataflyten ble konstruert fra en operativsystemet referanse for eksempel datakanalen eller utdata til konsollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den gjeldende Dataflyten støtter skriving.

trans-unit.source: If a class derived from <xref:System.IO.Stream> does not support writing, a call to <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.SetLength%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Write%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteByte%2A> throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.IO.Stream>støtter ikke skriving et kall til <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.SetLength%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Write%2A>, eller <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteByte%2A>oppstår <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteByte%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.SetLength%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If the stream is closed, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dataflyten er lukket, denne egenskapen returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the stream supports writing; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the stream is closed or was opened with read-only access.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Dataflyten støtter skriving; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis dataflyten er lukket eller ble åpnet med lesetilgang.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Waits for the pending asynchronous read operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: Venter på ventende asynkron leseoperasjonen skal fullføres.

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync*> instead; see the Remarks section.)
trans-unit.target: (Vurder å bruke <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync*>i stedet; se under Merknader.)</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync*>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> to implement asynchronous file operations.
trans-unit.target: I .NET Framework 4 og tidligere versjoner, må du bruke metoder som <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>og <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>implementere asynkrone filoperasjoner.</xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous file operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene er fortsatt tilgjengelige i det [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] å støtte eldre kode; imidlertid metodene for ny asynkron eksempel <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A>, og <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A>, hjelp du implementere asynkrone filoperasjoner enklere.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: EndRead must be called with this <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to find out how many bytes were read.
trans-unit.target: EndRead må kalles med denne <xref:System.IAsyncResult>å finne ut hvor mange byte ble lest.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The reference to the pending asynchronous request to wait for.
trans-unit.target: Referansen til ventende asynkron forespørselen om å vente.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read from the stream, between 0 (zero) and the number of bytes you requested.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte lest fra flyten, mellom 0 (null) og antall byte som du har bedt om.

trans-unit.source: Streams only return 0 only at the end of the stream, otherwise, they should block until at least 1 byte is available.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyter bare returnere 0 bare på slutten av dataflyten, ellers de bør blokkeres til minst 1 byte er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object was not created by calling <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginRead*> on this class.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref:System.IAsyncResult>objektet ble ikke opprettet ved å kalle <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginRead*>på denne klassen.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginRead*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous write operation and blocks until the I/O operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Avslutter en asynkron skriveoperasjon og blokker til i/u-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync*> instead; see the Remarks section.)
trans-unit.target: (Vurder å bruke <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync*>i stedet; se under Merknader.)</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A> to implement asynchronous file operations.
trans-unit.target: I .NET Framework 4 og tidligere versjoner, må du bruke metoder som <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>og <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A>implementere asynkrone filoperasjoner.</xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous file operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene er fortsatt tilgjengelige i det [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] å støtte eldre kode; imidlertid metodene for ny asynkron eksempel <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A>, og <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A>, hjelp du implementere asynkrone filoperasjoner enklere.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.FlushAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.ReadAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: EndWrite must be called exactly once for every call to <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: EndWrite må kalles nøyaktig én gang for hvert kall til <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginRead%2A>.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: Failing to end a read process before beginning another read operation can cause deadlock or other undesirable behavior.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke avslutte en lesefeil prosess før du begynner en annen operasjon kan føre til vranglås eller annen uønsket virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: The pending asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Ventende asynkron forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object was not created by calling <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginWrite*> on this class.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref:System.IAsyncResult>objektet ble ikke opprettet ved å kalle <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginWrite*>på denne klassen.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.BeginWrite*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle bufferne for denne dataflyten og fører til bufrede data skrives til den underliggende enheten.

trans-unit.source: Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Flush` or <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Sletter dataflyten ikke tømme den underliggende koderen med mindre du eksplisitt ringer `Flush` eller <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.%23ctor%2A> constructor, thus specifying the buffer size while creating the `BufferedStream` object, the content is flushed when it reaches the buffer size.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker den <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren, derfor angi bufferstørrelsen under oppretting av `BufferedStream` objektet, innholdet tømmes når bufferstørrelsen.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, code such as `BufferedStream bs = new BufferedStream(bs, 5)` will flush the content when the buffer size reaches 5 bytes.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel code eksempel `BufferedStream bs = new BufferedStream(bs, 5)` tømme innholdet når bufferstørrelsen når 5 byte.

trans-unit.source: All the read and write methods of `BufferedStream` automatically maintain the buffer, so there is no need to invoke `Flush` when switching back and forth between reading and writing.
trans-unit.target: Alle read og write metodene for `BufferedStream` automatisk Vedlikehold bufferen, slik at det er ingen grunn til å aktivere `Flush` når du bytter frem og tilbake mellom lesing og skriving.

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The data source or repository is not open.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden eller databasen er ikke åpen.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront tømmes alle bufferne for denne dataflyten, fører til at bufrede data skrives til den underliggende enheten og overvåker avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å overvåke for å avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone skriveoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the stream length in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Henter dataflytlengde i byte.

trans-unit.source: The stream length in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Dataflytlengde i byte.

trans-unit.source: The underlying stream is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or closed.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggende er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller lukket.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke søking.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt etter dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter posisjonen i gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The `get` accessor invokes <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A> to obtain the current position within the underlying stream and then adjusts this value according to the current position within the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Den `get` aksessor aktiverer <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A>ikke hente gjeldende plassering i den underliggende dataflyten og justerer denne verdien i henhold til gjeldende plassering i bufferen.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `set` accessor copies any data previously written to the buffer to the underlying stream, and then invokes <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den `set` aksessor kopierer data skrevet tidligere til bufferen til underliggende dataflyt, og aktiverer <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A>.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported.
trans-unit.target: Søking hvor som helst utover meldingens lengde dataflyten støttes.

trans-unit.source: The position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen i gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The value passed to <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek*> is negative.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er sendt til <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek*>er negativt.</xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.Seek*>

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs, such as the stream being closed.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår en i/u-feil for eksempel dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke søking.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt etter dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Copies bytes from the current buffered stream to an array.
trans-unit.target: Kopier byte fra gjeldende bufret strøm til en matrise.

trans-unit.source: The `Read` method will return 0 only if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: Den `Read` metoden returnerer 0 Hvis slutten på dataflyten er nådd.

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, `Read` always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning.
trans-unit.target: I alle andre tilfeller `Read` alltid leser minst én byte fra dataflyten før den returnerer.

trans-unit.source: By definition, if no data is available from the stream upon a call to `Read`, the `Read` method returns 0 (the end of the stream is reached automatically).
trans-unit.target: Ved definisjon, hvis ingen data er tilgjengelig fra flyten når et kall til `Read`, `Read` returneres 0 (slutten på dataflyten er nådd automatisk).

trans-unit.source: An implementation is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached.
trans-unit.target: Implementering er fri til å returnere færre byte enn forespurte selv om slutten på dataflyten ikke er nådd.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> for reading primitive data types.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>for lesing primitive datatyper.</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to which bytes are to be copied.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen som er byte som skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in the buffer at which to begin reading bytes.
trans-unit.target: Byteforskyvning i bufferen vil begynne å lese byte.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to be read.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte som leses.

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into array.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall byte lest til array .

trans-unit.source: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or 0 if the end of the stream has been reached before any data can be read.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være mindre enn antall byte som ble forespurt hvis mange byte er ikke tilgjengelig for øyeblikket, eller 0 Hvis slutten på dataflyten er nådd før data kan leses.

trans-unit.source: Length of array minus offset is less than count.
trans-unit.target: Length of array minus offset is less than count.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: offset or count is negative.
trans-unit.target: offseteller count er negativt.

trans-unit.source: The stream is not open or is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er ikke åpen eller er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke lesing.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt etter dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream, advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron leser en sekvens med byte fra den gjeldende dataflyten flytter posisjonen i dataflyten på antall byte som leses, og overvåker avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: You can create a cancellation token by creating an instance of the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource> class and passing the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A> property as the `cancellationToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette et avbryte token ved å opprette en forekomst av den <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource>klassen og sende den <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A>egenskapen som det `cancellationToken` parameteren.</xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A> </xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write the data into.
trans-unit.target: Buffer til å skrive inn dataene.

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in `buffer` at which to begin writing data from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen i byte i `buffer` som til å skrive data fra dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som skal leses.

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å overvåke for å avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone leseoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: The value of the TResult parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den TResult parameteren inneholder totalt antall byte som leses, til bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som resultat kan være mindre enn antall byte som ble forespurt om antall byte som er tilgjengelig for øyeblikket er mindre enn det forespurte antallet eller det kan være 0 (null) Hvis slutten på dataflyten er nådd.

trans-unit.source: buffer is .
trans-unit.target: bufferis .

trans-unit.source: offset or count is negative.
trans-unit.target: offseteller count er negativt.

trans-unit.source: The sum of offset and count is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: Summen av offset og count er større enn bufferlengden.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke lesing.

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er i bruk av en tidligere leseoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: Reads a byte from the underlying stream and returns the byte cast to an <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>, or returns -1 if reading from the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Leser en byte fra den underliggende dataflyten og returnerer byte endres til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""> </xref>, eller returnerer -1 Hvis lesing fra slutten på dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The byte cast to an <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>, or -1 if reading from the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Byten endres til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""> </xref>, eller -1 Hvis lesing fra slutten på dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs, such as the stream being closed.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår en i/u-feil for eksempel dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke lesing.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt etter dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Sets the position within the current buffered stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir posisjonen i gjeldende bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is negative, the new position will precede the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er negativ, den nye posisjonen kommer før plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is 0, the new position will be the position specified by `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er 0, den nye posisjonen plasseringen angitt av `origin`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is positive, the new position will follow the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er positivt, den nye plasseringen vil følge plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream> object is the base stream for a <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> object, calling the Seek method can cause the position of the stream to no longer match the position of the internal buffer in the reader.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream>objektet er Basisdataflyten for en <xref:System.IO.StreamReader>objektet, søk-metoden, kan det føre til at plasseringen av dataflyten samsvarer ikke lenger posisjonen for den interne bufferen i leseren.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader> </xref:System.IO.BufferedStream>

trans-unit.source: To reset the internal buffer, call the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.DiscardBufferedData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method; however, this method slows performance and should be called only when absolutely necessary.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestill den interne bufferen ved kall av <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.DiscardBufferedData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden; imidlertid denne metoden reduserer ytelse og skal kalles bare når det er absolutt nødvendig.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.DiscardBufferedData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported.
trans-unit.target: Søking hvor som helst utover meldingens lengde dataflyten støttes.

trans-unit.source: A byte offset relative to `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Byte offset forhold til `origin`.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin> indicating the reference point from which to obtain the new position.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>angir referanse som du kan hente den nye plasseringen.</xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>

trans-unit.source: The new position within the current buffered stream.
trans-unit.target: Den nye posisjonen i gjeldende bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The stream is not open or is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er ikke åpen eller er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke søking.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt etter dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the buffered stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvor lang bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The buffer is flushed before setting the length of the underlying data source or repository.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen er tømt før du angir hvor lang den underliggende datakilden eller -repositorium.

trans-unit.source: If the specified value is less than the current length of the buffered stream, the buffered stream is truncated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte verdien er mindre enn gjeldende lengde på bufret dataflyten, blir det avrundet bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: If the specified value is larger than the current length of the buffered stream, the buffered stream is expanded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte verdien er større enn gjeldende lengde på bufret dataflyten, utvidet bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: If the buffered stream is expanded, the contents of the buffered stream between the old and the new lengths are not defined.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bufret dataflyten er utvidet, er innholdet i bufret dataflyten mellom gamle og nye lengden ikke definert.

trans-unit.source: `SetLength` flushes any buffered writes if necessary.
trans-unit.target: `SetLength`Tømmer alle bufret skriver om nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: A stream must support both writing and seeking for `SetLength` to work.
trans-unit.target: En dataflyt må støtte både skrive- og søking `SetLength` skal fungere.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the desired length of the current buffered stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir ønsket lengde for gjeldende bufret strøm i byte.

trans-unit.source: value is negative.
trans-unit.target: valueer negativt.

trans-unit.source: The stream is not open or is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er ikke åpen eller er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support both writing and seeking.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke både skrive- og søking.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt etter dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Copies bytes to the buffered stream and advances the current position within the buffered stream by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer byte til bufret dataflyten og flytter gjeldende plassering i bufret dataflyten på antall byte skrevet.

trans-unit.source: The byte array from which to copy `count` bytes to the current buffered stream.
trans-unit.target: Bytematrise vil kopiere fra `count` byte til gjeldende bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The offset in the buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current buffered stream.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning i bufferen som du vil kopiere byte til gjeldende bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to be written to the current buffered stream.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte som skrives til gjeldende bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Length of array minus offset is less than count.
trans-unit.target: Length of array minus offset is less than count.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: offset or count is negative.
trans-unit.target: offseteller count er negativt.

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er lukket eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke skriving.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt etter dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream, advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront skriver en sekvens med byte til gjeldende strøm flytter gjeldende plassering i denne dataflyten på antall byte skrevet og overvåker avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: You can create a cancellation token by creating an instance of the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource> class and passing the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A> property as the `cancellationToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette et avbryte token ved å opprette en forekomst av den <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource>klassen og sende den <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A>egenskapen som det `cancellationToken` parameteren.</xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A> </xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data from.
trans-unit.target: Buffer til å skrive data fra.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in `buffer` from which to begin copying bytes to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning nullbasert byte i `buffer` som du vil kopiere byte til dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som skal skrive.

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å overvåke for å avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone Skriveoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: buffer is .
trans-unit.target: bufferis .

trans-unit.source: offset or count is negative.
trans-unit.target: offseteller count er negativt.

trans-unit.source: The sum of offset and count is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: Summen av offset og count er større enn bufferlengden.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke skriving.

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er i bruk av en tidligere skriveoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: Writes a byte to the current position in the buffered stream.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en byte til gjeldende plassering i bufret dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: A byte to write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: En byte til å skrive til dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten støtter ikke skriving.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt etter dataflyten er lukket.
